data: With the hum of New York above, below, and all about him, stirring his pulses and prodding his mental activities, Jerold Garrison, expert criminologist, stood at the window of his recently opened office, looking out upon the roofs and streets of the city with a new sense of pride and power in his being.
browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels
